name: fpa-lpa-dashboard
description: Real-time FPA/LPA performance dashboard for Distribution Center 6084. Track associate metrics, building goals, and area-specific performance with dynamic filtering and detailed analytics.
author: mplucer@walmart.com
features: Dynamic filtering by area, shift, and role
Score cards by area and shift

screenshots.title: FPA/LPA Report Overview
screenshots.description: Building goal tracking and area-specific performance metrics

screenshots.title: Associate Roster
screenshots.description: Manage team structure and filter by area, shift, and role

screenshots.title: Score Cards
screenshots.description: Detailed breakdown by area and shift with off-goal highlighting

requirements: Modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge 90+)
No installation needed - run directly from HTML
Excel/CSV files for data import (FPAOF and FPALD reports)
Roster file with User ID, Name, Area, Shift, Role columns
